name: Ms.Swetha
greetingText: How would u like a promotion..?
wishText: ...from my Best friend to My Alu with with the potential for consideration of higher roles in the future
text1: ...from my Best friend to My Alu with with the potential for consideration of higher roles in the future
text2: That's what I was going to do.

replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
